act: Development Board for Rural Wales Act (Repealed 1.10.1998)
section_text: 1 In section 12 of the  Development of Rural Wales Act 1976 (financial limit for the Development Board for Rural Wales), for subsection (2) there shall be substituted— 2 The said limit is £175 million. ; and section 2(3) of the  Industry Act 1981 (which increased the previous limit to £100 million) is hereby repealed.

act: Development Board for Rural Wales Act (Repealed 1.10.1998)
section_text: 2 This Act may be cited as the Development Board for Rural Wales Act 1991.
